column1: #Text=All the studied bulk polycrystalline samples of RECoPO (RE = La, Nd, and Sm) are prepared by single step solid-state reaction route via vacuum encapsulation technique [7, 11, 13].

#Text=High purity (~99.9%) rare earths (La, Nd, Sm), P, Co3O4 and Co in their stoichiometric amount are weighed, mixed and ground thoroughly using mortar and pestle under high purity Ar atmosphere in glove box.
#Text=The Humidity and Oxygen content in the glove box is less than 1 ppm.
#Text=The mixed powders were palletized and vacuum-sealed (10-4 Torr) in a quartz tube.
#Text=These sealed quartz ampoules were placed in box furnace and heat treated at 550oC for 12 hours, 850oC for 12 hours and then at 1150oC for 33 hours in continuum.
#Text=Finally furnace is allowed to cool down to room temperature at a rate of 10C/minute.
